nodes.text: Therj'io'nuruodo was a Chiss male of the Interplanetary Component Exchange stationed on the reconstituted Sith Empire's Vaiken Spacedock during the Cold War and Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Empire.
Therj'io'nuruodo appears in the massively multiplayer online roleplaying video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as the I.C.E. reputation vendor.
